node.text:
Ice cores contain clues about Earth’s ancient past, like frozen viruses and insects. 

The clock is ticking. Read why we can't wait any longer by tapping the link in our bio #ice #glaciers #environment #conservation #sustainability #SDIS21

node.title: Scientists are racing to collect ice cores before global warming melts them

node.accessibility_caption:
The audience inside the Richard Rogers theatre in Manhattan, New York, applaud the performance of the musical Hamilton as Broadway shows roar back to life. 

After being closed for more than a year due to the pandemic, the world's most famous live theatre locations are once again open to the public to enjoy renowned shows such as The Lion King, Phantom of the Opera, Chicago and Wicked. 

#musical #theater #arts #broadway #newyork 

REUTERS/Eduardo Munoz

node.text:
The audience inside the Richard Rogers theatre in Manhattan, New York, applaud the performance of the musical Hamilton as Broadway shows roar back to life. 

After being closed for more than a year due to the pandemic, the world's most famous live theatre locations are once again open to the public to enjoy renowned shows such as The Lion King, Phantom of the Opera, Chicago and Wicked. 

#musical #theater #arts #broadway #newyork 

REUTERS/Eduardo Munoz

node.accessibility_caption:
An ice sculpture slowly melts in London, as part of an environmental and public health campaign by WaterAid. 

The sculpture, along with several others depicting the world's population, will be allowed to melt away to highlight the threat posed globally by climate change to healthy water supplies. The water will then be collected and repurposed. 

#water #climatechange #environment #sustainability #london 

REUTERS/Toby Melville

node.text:
Ice cores contain clues about Earth’s ancient past, like frozen viruses and insects. 

The clock is ticking. Read why we can't wait any longer by tapping the link in our bio #ice #glaciers #environment #conservation #sustainability #SDIS21

node.text:
The carbon is pumped deep underground, where it turns into rock. 

Learn more about this incredible new plant by tapping the link in our bio #iceland #environment #conservation #sustainability #SDIS21

node.accessibility_caption:
The Inspiration4 shuttle launches from the Kennedy Space Center in Cape Canaveral, Florida. 

The crew, comprising of four amateur astronauts, will spend the next three days circling the Earth in the Dragon capsule provided by SpaceX, as space tourism continues to thrive. 

#space #tourism #travel #exploration #florida 

REUTERS/Steve Nesius

node.text:
The Inspiration4 shuttle launches from the Kennedy Space Center in Cape Canaveral, Florida. 

The crew, comprising of four amateur astronauts, will spend the next three days circling the Earth in the Dragon capsule provided by SpaceX, as space tourism continues to thrive. 

#space #tourism #travel #exploration #florida 

REUTERS/Steve Nesius

COVID-19 remains the top concern.

node.text:
Traffic and rail noise increase the risk of dementia. 

Learn more about how we can fight this terrible disease by tapping the link in our bio #dementia #health #healthcare #medical #treatment
